title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, February 8, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of John Grisham (1955), who wrote his first best-seller, “The Firm,” using rules for suspense that he read about in a Writer’s Digest article.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of John Grisham (1955), who wrote his first best-seller, “The Firm,” using rules for suspense that he read about in a Writer’s Digest article.
